scripts.postbuild: regex-replace "class Logger" "class fireLogger" "./build/efb.js" --filecontents && regex-replace "const logger = new Logger" "const logger = new fireLogger" "./build/efb.js" --filecontents && regex-replace "const k = new Logger" "const k = new fireLogger" "./build/efb.js" --filecontents && copyfiles --flat build/*.js efb.html ../../JPLogistics_C152_Additional/html_ui/Pages/VCockpit/Instruments/JPLogistics/EFB && copyfiles --flat build/*.js efb.html ../../../Packages/jplogistics-c152/html_ui/Pages/VCockpit/Instruments/JPLogistics/EFB && copyfiles --flat build/*.css ../../JPLogistics_C152_Additional/html_ui/Pages/VCockpit/Instruments/JPLogistics/EFB/styles && copyfiles --flat build/*.css ../../../Packages/jplogistics-c152/html_ui/Pages/VCockpit/Instruments/JPLogistics/EFB/styles
